text:
Dr. Steven Goodman (@goodmanmetrics) is discussing ethical compromises, particularly for current #COVID19 #vaccine trial patients on placebo, with the @US_FDA. There are many considerations here and he frames the issue well! Link to @cspan below! #HPJC
